original_text:
Fire also broke out in their company;
    the flame burned up the wicked.
korean_text: 불이 그들의 당에 붙음이여 화염이 악인들을 살랐도다

sentences.original_text: Fire also broke out in their company
sentences.korean_translation: 불 또한 그들의 무리 가운데서 타올랐다

sentences.original_text: the flame burned up the wicked.
